articles.author: Ben Gardner
articles.title: Why England won’t quite be knocked out of the World Cup even if they lose to India - Wisden
articles.description: England's World Cup campaign is almost, but not quite over, and it still won't be even if they lose to India. Read more
articles.content:
Englands 2023 World Cup campaign has been going on for weeks, lurching from disaster to catastrophe, and its only about to get harder, with India, unbeaten hosts and tournament favourites, up next.
